. It is both bleak and picturesque with its historic and still-used lighthouse standing watch over the village and the granite rocks and cliffs.

There is no public transport there: only rent car, bus tour or hire a taxi.

Highway 333 is the only road in and out of town (take exit 5 from Hwy 103). It is about 45 minutes southwest of

The tour buses roll in steadily so it's better to get out there early in the day if you want to avoid them. Most bus tour start at 9am, 50-60CAD.
Boat tour are possible too: 2 to 4h tour from 25CAD.
